name: Avoid River Hurdle
description:
Draw a shape on screen and get it recognized, if the shape matches the incoming object/collectable your boat will steer towards the object. The objective is to protect yourself from the rocks in the river. Draw shapes with your finger on the screen in this beautiful rocky river environment.

In Avoid River Hurdle: Draw to Collect every collectable is associated with a shape you just have remember the shape to draw and steer your boat towards the collectable.

This is a small app with fun small game concept, you must have great brain and magic fingers. This game tests your memory and drawing skills.

What are you waiting for download Avoid River Hurdle: Draw to Collect game and sharpen your brain and drawing skills.
